name: Clonking around happily with my trusty sword
name_original: Clonking around happily with my trusty sword
description:
This is a physics based high-speed 2D platformer in which you try to reach your God in as little time as possible. To get the fastest time you will have to break the physics engine.

Controls - Mouse only

You don't walk.

You press left mouse button to charge your attack, on release you smash your sword, preferably into something like a wall or an enemy.

Movement:

- Think "melee rocket jump"

In house play testing record: 15 seconds.
Try to break that record!

Credits

Clonking around happily with my trusty sword is our first game. It was made for the Wowie Jam 2.0! over the course of a weekend.

Jonas Kolodzie - Programming, Game Design, Artwork

norb_norb - Game Idea, Game Design, Artwork
